abilities.name: Battlefield first aid
abilities.effect: 1AP, Once per battle: Heal 1D3 +1 wounds to a friendly operative within Control Range. Can only be used if there are no enemy operatives within 3″ of this operative or the target.

abilities.name: Extended Mags
abilities.effect: Place an ammunition box marker within Control Range. Whenever a friendly operative performs a Shoot action within Control Range of the ammunition box marker, they add one attack dice but cannot retain critical successes from it.

abilities.name: Mist Veil
abilities.effect: 1AP, Once per battle: This operative is treated as in Cover until the end of its next activation. Enemy operatives more than 12″ away also treat it as Obscured.

abilities.name: The Wind’s Gift
abilities.effect: Once per battle: This operative suffers 1 wound to restore 2D3 +1 wounds to another friendly operative within 6 inches, cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy.

abilities.name: Unrelenting Agility
abilities.effect: Once per battle: this operative may perform Shoot action within control range of an enemy operative if that same operative was the target of previous charge action during this activation. If the target survives, this operative gains 1AP until the end of the activation.

abilities.name: Quick Assault
abilities.effect: Once per battle: if this operative hasn't done a shoot action during this activation and performed a charge action, it can resolve two dice in sequence and add 1dmg to both their damage.

abilities.name: Fractal Visions
abilities.effect: Once per Battle: Reroll a failed shooting attack dice.

abilities.name: Mist Veilwalk
abilities.effect: 1AP: Teleport 6″ through mist zones. Roll 1D6; on a 4+, change order to Conceal Order.

abilities.name: Screaming Vortex
abilities.effect: 1AP: Once per Battle. Summon one of your deployables within control range.

abilities.name: Heretic Astartes
abilities.effect: Once per battle: This operative gains 1AP and it can perform either two Shoot actions or two Fight actions. You cannot select the same psychic ranged weapon more than once. For the rest of the battle it can counteract regarless of order.

abilities.name: Mist Regeneration
abilities.effect: At the start of activation, if in a mist zone, roll 1D6 on a 4+ and heal wounds based on mist density: Light Mist (1 wound), Medium Mist (1D3 wounds), Dense Mist (2D3 wounds).

abilities.name: Boulder Roll
abilities.effect: 1AP: Move up to 6 inches in a straight line. Operatives within 1 inch of the path suffer 1D3 wounds.

abilities.name: Fortify
abilities.effect: 1AP: Place a deployable within 3 inches. Max 2 per game.

abilities.name: Techmarine Astartes
abilities.effect: Once per battle: This operative gains 1AP and it can perform either two Shoot actions, two Fight actions or two Fortity actions. You must select at least one PISTOL weapon to perform two shoot actions this way. For the rest of the battle it can counteract regarless of order.
